name: Beanz Squad
description: STORY     You live in one of the best cities in the world - in a Bright Town! You, like all the inhabitans of this place, are a bean - o - man. You have a rare chance to participate in the annual battles called "Beanz Squad"... GAMEPLAY     1. Grab the energo sphere in the center of map. 2. Survive with it 30 seconds. 3. Don't let anyone take the sphere before you! CONTROLS ActionMouse + keyboardMove WASDLookMouse rotateJumpSpaceShootLMBChange weaponMouse wheel/numbers RULES     1. NOT use cheats. 2. NOT team up with rivals. 3. NOT use obscene language in the nickname/room name. 4. NOT buy THE CAN (dlc) from pirate sites. PLUSES     1. Creating a room take less than 2 minutes. 2. Oportunity to play with friends. 3. The ability to customize the character, wepons and name. 4. A lot of maps. 5. Ultimated player capacity per room. 6. Great settings options
